Dame Cindy Kiro arrives at Tūrangawaewae Marae to pay her respects to Kīngi Tūheitia https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/dame-cindy-kiro-arrives-at-turangawaewae-marae-to-pay-her-respects-to-kingi-tuheitia/3P7FQCSMZVGVXAFX6B7TH364HQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/dame-cindy-kiro-arrives-at-turangawaewae-marae-to-pay-her-respects-to-kingi-tuheitia/3P7FQCSMZVGVXAFX6B7TH364HQ/ Marae gates open to welcome iwi paying respects to Kīngi Tūheitia Sun, 01 Sep 2024 01:08:18 +0000 Governor-General Dame Cindy Kiro was welcomed onto Tūrangawaewae Marae to pay her respects to Kīngi Tūheitia, to her right is Sir Tumu Te Heuheu. Photo / Kīngitanga.

Lawyer Jason Yang promised DJ lessons as payment, then tried to sue client at Disputes Tribunal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-jason-yang-promised-dj-lessons-as- payment-then-tried-to-sue-client-at-disputes-tribunal/F7KP2V54NNFVJG2QCC7WPSI3LA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-jason-yang-promised-dj-lessons-as- payment-then-tried-to-sue-client-at-disputes-tribunal/F7KP2V54NNFVJG2QCC7WPSI3LA/ Jeremy WilkinsonJason Yang forged invoices to hide his client from his employer before suing the DJ. Sun, 01 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Jason Yang has been suspended from practice for a year after the Lawyers and Conveyancers Disciplinary Tribunal found him guilty of misconduct.
